citation.article-title: Biochemical and genetic evidence for the transfer of Mycobacterium tuberculosis subsp. caprae Aranaz et al. 1999 to the species Mycobacterium bovis Karlson and Lessel 1970 (approved lists 1980) as Mycobacterium bovis subsp. caprae comb. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Mycobacterium bovis subsp. bovis subsp. nov.

Under Rule 46 of the Bacteriological Code, the transfer of M. tuberculosis subsp. caprae to the species M. bovis as M. bovis subsp. caprae comb. nov. automatically leads to the creation of a second subspecies, M. bovis subsp. bovis subsp. nov. The description is the same as that given for Mycobacterium bovis by Wayne & Kubica (1986) with the addition that isolates are resistant to PZA.
